website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering if you like cats and want a self-stirring mug that has a large capacity. However, quality control is lacking with the construction and components.
pros: Stands out for the cute cat face graphic on the front of the mug
Large 15.2-ounce capacity with a powerful self-stirring mechanism
Available in 3 colors – black, pink, and blue
cons: Comes with some quality concerns, including magnets, handles, and mug exteriors that break or crack with normal use

customer_reviews.title: SUPER CUTE!
customer_reviews.text: This mug is super super cute. The one factor that drew me to this mug was the kitty face on it! I did not even realize it was self-stirring until I received it in the mail. The mug is bigger than I expected it to be, which is a great thing because I like big mugs! The self-stirring mechanism is actually pretty unique and works quite well! I think this mug is a little hard to clean just becuause you have to be careful not to lose the pill looking stirrer and not to get the batteries wet. Otherwise, I am happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: This mug is good quality and works better for blending Bulletproof Coffee than an electric blender.
customer_reviews.text: We love these Leadnovo mugs. I love mine for mixing my Bulletproof Coffee. It works better than my electric blenders. My husband uses his for mixing his vitamin smoothies in the morning. He was skeptical at first, but he was so sold on it, we bought another as a gift for our Grandson who is going off to college. We love, love, love them!
customer_reviews.author: Spa Girl

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to help me make my protein drinks that did not leave any grains on the bottom. And this does the job very, very well. As a bonus, I can use it for hot beverages like coffee or hot coco too! It's easy to clean and looks nice as well. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Timi C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this cup. I used it for my Keto coffee and it did a great job. I take care of it and don’t submerge it in water and also try to not get the battery compartment wet. I clean the inside first then turn it up side down to clean the outside avoiding the bottom where the battery compartment is. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and lasting
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a co-worker and they love it because we don’t have anything to stir coffee with readily available. Battery life lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Leanna Rose

customer_reviews.title: My wrist thanks you😘
customer_reviews.text: Back when i had to manually stir my cup I felt a burning sensation in my wrist. I thought "if only there was another way..." 🤔 Sure enough there was, and this cup is a gift from the coffee gods. 😇 I now no longer have to stir my cup like a peseant, just hit that button with my thumb and whoosh its stirred pefectly.👍
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Bird

customer_reviews.title: Stirs bulletproof coffee in seconds!
customer_reviews.text: Got my new self stirring mug today. I really like it. Only took seconds to mix well my bulletproof coffee. Easy to use, easy installation of two AAA batteries in the bottom. Will be perfect to use in my office.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a busy person on the go
customer_reviews.text: Being on a Keto diet it can be annoying when your bulletproof coffee needs to be stirred after you have left home or the kitchen. It works great and has been a lifesaver to someone like myself who is busy and on the go. Great purchase and I will be buying more for gifts for friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: convenient, fun & practical
customer_reviews.text: it exceeded my expectations. I am a cat lover so the graphic is a bonus but the practicality of the actual mug is priceless. I'm often speeding out the door to work in the morning and prefer my coffee from home, with splash of milk and sugar. while i get ready, coffee brews... i fill my cup, splash of milk and sugar then cover it and stir on the way to the car.... love love love this mug!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sonia GataSalvaje

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I love the grumpy cat face and I love that it's pink but best of all, it keeps my KETO KREME mixed while I enjoy my coffee!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P.

customer_reviews.title: The mug that can needs help please.
customer_reviews.text: Yes the self stiring makes my coffee creamy and frothy and very enjoyable. The mug worked great until I dropped it and the lid broke and the little stir mechanism flew out never to be found. Looking for a replacement bar and lid. Please help bring joy back to my morning coffee....
customer_reviews.author: AvesOro

customer_reviews.title: Works great & easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my special drinks which use 2 tablespoons of raw cacao powder, daisy blend, and milk. Works great! Easy to clean. Way less time consuming than a handheld blender.
customer_reviews.author: Pebbles

customer_reviews.title: Ugh, loose lid made a mess on my desk after FIRST use!
customer_reviews.text: Utter garbage. I paid extra for this and the lid super loose. I found this out the hard way because when it tipped over it just flew off. It wasn't even a hard hit on the damn thing... it just tipped over and the lid came off. Unfortunately the coffee got all over my desk, keyboard, etc. I have other cups that have NEVER done that. Secondly, the mixer is underwhelming. This was returned.
customer_reviews.author: E. Nathan

customer_reviews.title: READ THIS FIRST! DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the review before I bought this so please read this first! He's a list of reasons why I recommend not buying and why I'm returning it. 1. Cheap materials. Out of the it came with a cracked lid. It popped off after I used it once and revealed that it's cracked. 2. The magnetic stirrer kept falling out of place half of the time which made it a hassle to get it back to the center while you have hot liquid in the cup. Would not recommend. Just use a stir stick if you have to, at the very least use a spoon. Not worth the purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Seyha

customer_reviews.title: Defective right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: My self stirring mug is defective. It DOES NOT stir. As soon as it is powered on a whirring can be heard, but no movement in the liquid. I finally reached my finger into the hot coffee and found that the little stirring device is stuck to the side of the mug. Once I turn it off it goes back to the center where it belongs. This makes me very sad, as I was excited and planned to purchase several of these as gifts for friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Luv

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a month
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these cups and used them exclusively for about a month.... every morning. Love the concept and the cups are cute. However, I believe the placement of the battery causes a problem. For obvious reasons, you must wash these by hand and even being very careful with the process, one of our cups completely stopped working after about a month. We replaced the batteries every two weeks when we were using them. Now they are going in the trash and I've decided to use a spoon to stir going forward.
customer_reviews.author: champ

customer_reviews.title: Keto Coffee
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because some reviews said it was perfect for the bulletproof coffee and that it almost worked as well as a blender.... This would be more suitable for reg coffee mixing the sugar and creamer or tea with sugar or honey..etc. It's not as strong to make keto coffee "Frothy" but definitely gift able for someone. It keeps the coffee fairly warm and overall I am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: AP3

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last the life of the first batteries
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working before the first set of batteries died. I tried new batteries just to be sure. When nothing worked I opened it up. The little motor was soaking wet even though it was inside a sealed compartment. This cup was never submerged and only hand washed. It was cute while it lasted but it didn't last long for what it cost.
customer_reviews.author: Malayo

customer_reviews.title: Broke 4 days after purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Received Monday. Today the handle broke off when I was washing the mug.. the plastic just broke. Returning item.
customer_reviews.author: Marelle Moore

customer_reviews.title: neat product, but broke after the 30 day return period.
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a neat idea, and while it worked well in the beginning, it broke too quickly. I only hand washed this item and never allowed it to be submerged, but the water still got into the electronics and caused it to fail. While the cup is large, the capacity was much smaller than it looked. I would not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C.

customer_reviews.title: No customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these in the past and it worked well. Bought a second one for our other daughter and if you put the drink in then start mixing the spinner goes off center and does not mix. You have to start it spinning then pour in the drink. This causes a lot of splashing. Past return period because it was a gift and we only tested to see if it spun before wrapping it. Contacted leadnovo but have not heard back from them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste Of Money
customer_reviews.text: The mug that I received was obviously not brand new. The box had been opened and an edge had been ripped off, there were no enclosed directions in the box and I found a capsule of some sort inside. I put batteries in and when I turned it on to mix, it didn’t. I bought this as a gift for a friend’s birthday and I can’t give it to her. I ordered This about 2 months ago so it’s not returnable. I’m out the $$ that I paid for this and now need to find a Replacement gift.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Tri

customer_reviews.title: Your Mileage May Vary
customer_reviews.text: Water gets into the battery compartment very easily. The switch failed on mine 1 month after the return window closed.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Mast

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey for the power it has.
customer_reviews.text: Cute cup I wanted a on the go blender cup for my keto coffee ( butter heavy cream coffee) but honestly it’s more of a novelty item for me. Needs to be stronger! I still go back to my magic bullet for my Bullet proof coffee. I find I like to use it more for a stir! Usually a regular coffee with just a little cream.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mug for keto drinks
customer_reviews.text: Love this self stirring mug for my bone broth when doing low carb keto type diet with intermittent fasting. Keeps the liquid warm and mixes up with the push of the button on the handle. Great to drink from on a chilly night.
customer_reviews.author: KR Pink Momma

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it...🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: The cup is “cute” but not display cute. The stirrer no longer works. I replaced the batteries and all. The cup itself is insulated, but to travel with it is not a good idea as the top is not a screw top. The price point is a bit high for something that could be bought at the local dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: Smyleigh1

customer_reviews.title: Best Mug Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Cat self stirring mug! This thing is amazing, so cool, works Great. Just buy this if you want something that stirs your beverage for you. You will not be disappointed. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Wished it lasted more than a handful of ‘stirs’
customer_reviews.text: Loved the mug....until it suddenly stopped working. I’ve only had it 6-7 months and only use it a few times a month so I was surprised when it just randomly stopped working the other day. It’s never been submerged, the batteries are new and the cup is clean (no residue). I would give more stars happily - if only it worked more than 2-3 times a month x 7 months maximum. I’m disappointed for the money I spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: Audre

customer_reviews.title: Fun Gift
customer_reviews.text: Cute cup, spinner works great. Lost interest in what i actually bought it for. Is kind of loud when you use. Easy to clean though.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: What you see is not what you will get!!!😞
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was a complete disappointment. The mug that I received was black and silver with no cute cat face. The mug had an animation, a palm print captioned give me five and the word coffee on the other side. Totally misrepresented the product. Epic failure!!
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my friend
customer_reviews.text: Great mug. Be careful when washing. Do not submerge in water, just rinse. Also be careful to not lose the little magnetic bean inside.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Westphal

customer_reviews.title: Definitely pleased with performance
customer_reviews.text: Got to say this is the coolest coffee cup I’ve ever purchased. Popped a few new batteries in it and it mixes all the ingredients for my particular coffee taste very easily. Got to say if this little gadget holds up, I may purchase more. Definitely happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent T

customer_reviews.title: The mixer “thing” comes off.
customer_reviews.text: The thing that blends the liquid comes off. it is a magnetic, so all the time I was pouring liquids, it floated. Not good!
customer_reviews.author: Jheff

customer_reviews.title: Quirky fun gift thats also practical!
customer_reviews.text: Pros - mixes amazingly well and the mechanism is not loud. I love the fun look and feel of the mug and it made a perfect gift for anyone who likes their coffee warm but doesn't want the milk to curdle on top. I've had a couple of self mixing mugs but sometimes I would get a tornado and other times a wave, this hits the balance between both. Cons - batteries not included
customer_reviews.author: DA-Jessica Astudillo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! My friend love it. The scoring part of it is literally just a magnet so it’s super easy to clean. Just pull the little pill off! I’m sooo glad I bought it for her.
customer_reviews.author: Marlen Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Grumpy Kitty
customer_reviews.text: Bought for secret santa gift, my coworker loved it. Now she doesn't have to stir the cup and she can look at grumpy kitty and laugh a little.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I don't have to waste energy stirring my hot chocolate. It is easy to use; just pour the hot water into the mug, add the hot chocolate mix, press the button to stir, and enjoy. Do not wash it in the dishwasher! I made that mistake with my first self stirring mug and ruined it.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha L Mears

customer_reviews.title: I was great when I first got it and mixed my coffee ...
customer_reviews.text: I was great when I first got it and mixed my coffee great. The problem was it wasn't well made and broke after two months. I hand washed it but a little water must have gotten in and it broke. The concept is fantastic has it been more well made I would have given it 5-stars but sadly it's cheap and won't last.
customer_reviews.author: Neesee

customer_reviews.title: Great mug... don't be clumsy & drop it
customer_reviews.text: I love it. But sometimes the motor doesn't start and I've got to tap it on the counter to get it going. Fragile for dropping. If it gets knocked off the table, the motor breaks. This is my third one because I was clumsy. I sent one to each of my siblings for Christmas. They all live them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Oberlies

customer_reviews.title: This is the dumbest design ever. You can't put ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the dumbest design ever. You can't put it in the dishwasher and I get that. But you also can't wash it at all because the compartment for the batteries isn't sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING AFTER A WEEK!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my husband for Christmas. HE LOVED IT!!!!!!! UNTIL IT BROKE!! ABOUT ONE WEEK LATER. It started off the little pill would not stay in the middle, would not spin. It would go back and forth it would work properly then not. We changed the batteries to no avail. AHHHHH it was so nice while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, needs work!
customer_reviews.text: Cute cup, I couldn’t resist buying. However, it didn’t last a month, very disappointed that spent my Christmas gift card on it. It just stopped stirring, new batteries, no water in the battery compartment, has never been submerged, I don’t know? Also, the lid will just randomly fall off and doesn’t stay on if bumped. I really love the idea, but definitely needs more engineering work.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie C.

customer_reviews.title: Love this cup!
customer_reviews.text: This cup is amazing to mix my coffee with! Used to use a hand mixer but this is easier. Very cute. Only four stars because I wish it was dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: moe

customer_reviews.title: Nice mug
customer_reviews.text: Got water logged with the first wash and sometimes the motor works
customer_reviews.author: Angie Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap gift that actually works
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. It’s a funny gift, and actually works the way it’s supposed to, so someone could actually get some use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: darrick c akey

customer_reviews.title: Awkward size but so cute.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. Stirs your coffee well. Only wish or would fit in a cup holder. It is too wide to fit anywhere on the go.
customer_reviews.author: rgholson

customer_reviews.title: Immediate return
customer_reviews.text: The magnetic stirrir is bad. Pops off the center every time when you pour liquid into it. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Beltran

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee mug. Super cute and stirs itself well. Sadly I've had it for a week and the Kitty face is already coming off. So works but heartbreaking
customer_reviews.author: Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Nice cup
customer_reviews.text: I had an older auto stirring cup you had to hold button down. This is automated so you press the button and it keeps stirring until you press button again. Also stirs very quickly. Nice cup. I also like the magnetic stirrer which makes it easy to clean. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Nack

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: The magnet goes fast and because of that it can make a mess. However the cup is highly amusing. Already broken because the place where the batteries goes got wet.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Fix

customer_reviews.title: Destroyed packaging (and not a problem of UPS!)
customer_reviews.text: The amazon delivery box was completely in tact with proper packaging fillers, while this was the box inside; destroyed. I'm glad the product still works, but it basically fell out of the box it was so wrecked. Not promising of the company itself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Auto stirrer is excellent feature! Received one for Christmas...liked it so much, bought this one for somebody else. Use almost everyday and still original battery.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hoskins

customer_reviews.title: Striving without a spoon
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Helps with my bulletproof coffee. It Strives the butter in my coffee. Great
customer_reviews.author: 34SmashNeal

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The magnetic spinner doesn’t spin, it gets out and almost swallowed the thing.
customer_reviews.author: Sayan Joshi

customer_reviews.title: Nice mug
customer_reviews.text: Actually frothed the coffee. Mixes better than I'd hoped. Bought as a gag gift for coworker who spends a protracted amount of time stirring his coffee, but it truly works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not last a month
customer_reviews.text: Did not even last a month . I was careful to always hand wash and dry, but the cup died😾 I thought it was the batteries, but it just stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: luvanrs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Works great! I bought it for my moms survival birthday and she loved it!!! So so glad I found this one!
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Abbott

customer_reviews.title: Good. Bought for a gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one for my cousin. He is a Keto coffee lover so this works out.
customer_reviews.author: Harvetta Hart

customer_reviews.title: The top comes off very easily
customer_reviews.text: Love my mug, the only thing that the top comes off very easily so it spills. I have to hold it between my legs when I'm driving to work and the top comes off when driving if I'm not careful.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie Lockman

customer_reviews.title: Great for keto coffee
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband, who is on the keto diet. He wanted a self stirring mug for his keto coffee. He really loves this one!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great stirring Mug!
customer_reviews.text: Great stirring mug! Took me a bit to figure out that the "plastic pill shape" device in the bottom. Works fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Motor City Madman

customer_reviews.title: Daughter drinks bullet proof coffee that gets stirred often
customer_reviews.text: Daughter drinks bullet proof coffee that needs to be stirred often. She seemed excited!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: It's so nice not to have to sit and stir to get ...
customer_reviews.text: I am always in a rush to get my morning breakfast in my mouth within 30 minutes of waking. I pour my coffee in and add protein powder and octane oil. It's so nice not to have to sit and stir to get them all mixed. Just press the button and it does the work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: I liked the cute cat face on the mug and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked the cute cat face on the mug and the stay on feature of the stirring however it was not good for traveling. I needed something I could take with me to work and this mug spilled all over me and the car on several occasions. Also, I was always knocking off the lid and was afraid I would loose the magnetic stirrer in the bottom of the mug.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t mix as well as I thought. But I love it regardless.
customer_reviews.author: jill gobeil

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great Mug. Only downfall is that it doesn't keep coffee hot very long. Also DO NOT microwave the mug. It will kill the motor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: As a gift is perfect. As a daily use I cannot determine since I did not purchase for myself
customer_reviews.author: Elmer Neris

customer_reviews.title: Great for office
customer_reviews.text: My wife stole mine. Had to buy a second one. No more hunting spoons at the office. Works great and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrennon

customer_reviews.title: So sad
customer_reviews.text: So sad!!! This mug is so cute but the self stir doesn’t work! the pill pops off and it doesn’t stir. We contacted the company and had no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great mug!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mug and I love the stir bar! This is great and at under 20 bucks it’s the best gift / self gift ever. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ali Syed

customer_reviews.title: Great keto coffee mug!!!
customer_reviews.text: This cup is PERFECT for keto coffee at work. Just add butter/mct to coffee, put on lid, and press stir button!! No mess, no fuss! Cup even fits under the Keurig! 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Klein

customer_reviews.title: Good if you like it to not stir....
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, it’s super flawed. Unless you like sticking your finger in hot coffee to readjust the magnetic piece that stirs the coffee, I’d buy a different kind. Am requesting refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Thompson

customer_reviews.title: it looks exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.text: The cup is so cute,it looks exactly like the picture. It’s easy to clean. I use it in my office everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Honestly i was so excited and happy with this cup until it started breaking to little pieces all the sudden after a week. Now i can see the metal layer in the middle of the cup. Very disappointing 😟
customer_reviews.author: pi

customer_reviews.title: Vendor surprised me with a brand new one after mine broke!
customer_reviews.text: Had some issues with my first cup. Absolutely loved it until I dropped it and it was rendered unusable. After posting my review saying such, the vendor took it upon themselves to send me a brand new one. Thanks a bunch guys you're awesome!
customer_reviews.author: shannon tyler

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Mug.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mug. it has a magnetic stirring stick so it handles hot and cold beverages.
customer_reviews.author: leonard magnus

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 5 uses :(
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these and this one stopped working within a month. So sad because we really like the concept and the mug is cute :(
customer_reviews.author: Kellie N Terry

customer_reviews.title: Stir away
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. It has issues with thicker liquid but that is to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: MadMan

customer_reviews.title: Loved this coffee cup
customer_reviews.text: Loved this coffee cup. I make bullet proof coffee and this mixed it very well. I brought another one for work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Cup works but on only the 3rd use, the rubber gasket in the lid tore (and the cup was ONLY every handwashed-NEVER put into the dishwasher). Now lid won't stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: VET

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget gift
customer_reviews.text: This mug creates quite an impressive vortex. Kids love it for chocolate milk and hot chocolate. It was a fun gift for my daughter who loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Furnell

customer_reviews.title: The cuteness didn’t last... it broke and I could return it
customer_reviews.text: This stir cup is amazing. I was enjoying it, but then the outside plastic part just started to crack. I went to pick it up and pieces of the plastic fell apart.. I had to tape it. Update... Never heard back from the seller
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This mug exceeded all expectations I had for its performance. I drink lots of bulletproof coffee, and it does an EXCELLENT job blending my coconut oil and heavy cream. And as a cat lover, I liked the little angry cat face on the side. However, I'm so happy with my mug and coffee that it should be a smiling face now :)
customer_reviews.author: F Lamont

customer_reviews.title: Love this cup!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my cup. It's great for coffee, tea and hot chocolate. It works great when you need a re-stir before you finish your drink.
customer_reviews.author: Howslee

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Mug
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my cat-loving girlfriend. She also loves coffee and often has to stir her mug, so I thought this would be perfect. It works well and she seems to enjoy it! It's also a conversation starter at work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Now have 2nd cup , quit working after a few weeks. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift!
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by this things power. I love the engineering... it’s magnetic!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Rad

customer_reviews.title: Not a travel mug.
customer_reviews.text: The cup is nice and sturdy but the lid will not stay on.
customer_reviews.author: ka

customer_reviews.title: Love the idea of this mug
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea of this mug , but after 1 week of useage , did not even wash it but rinse only , the plastic handle site CRACKED , so mad that I pay much of this cute mug but did not make it too far ! Really need to IMOROVE the QUALITY of the mug to make it stronger !
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Love this cup
customer_reviews.text: I use instant keto coffee and mc oil and stir it up with the cup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blends and froths!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect mug to blend my BPC on the go. No oily residue, even gives me my froth on top
customer_reviews.author: MondayIsntMyThing

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT. IT WILL STIR ANY KIND OF LIQUID WITH NO PROBLEMS.
customer_reviews.author: Motherload

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the way it looked and it did a great job of stirring my coffee ... until it stopped working 8 days later. Even changed the batteries thinking it drained them really fast and still nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Waters

customer_reviews.title: Product was great for 3 days
customer_reviews.text: Product was great for 3 days. Built poorly and cracked. Not sure how but by third day product had a crack down the side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would not purchase this item again
customer_reviews.text: I did not trust having the magnet in the bottom of mug. Had to remove batteries for every wash. The button that you push to operate the mug just popped off one day. I love coffee and coffee mugs. I collect coffee mugs and was not happy with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Amazing item
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It's great to make coffee bullet proof .. fast shipping too
customer_reviews.author: Gisela Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Cute but quit working
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product, my coworker has one and she told me her squit working. I went ahead and ordered mine and it quit working after 2 weeks. Great idea bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Lavern Gaines

customer_reviews.title: Convenience
customer_reviews.text: My dad love it. Save his time to stir up his coffee daily. And the size is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Jdog

customer_reviews.title: A perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cup for my daughter for Christmas. She absolutely loved the cup and she also loved the box which had a poem and positive sayings on it. It easily recieves 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Abrams

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Worked great the first time, hasn't worked since. I wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John E Rymer Jr

product_meta.title: LEADNOVO Update Self Stirring Mug Auto Self Mixing Stainless Steel Cup for Bulletproof/Keto Coffee/Tea/Hot Chocolate/Milk/Cocoa Protein Shaker Mug for Office/Kitchen/Travel/Home -450ml/15.2oz (Black)
feature_bullets: INTEGRATED DESIGN, 100% LEAKPROOF GUARANTEE: Optimize the design of the first generation to integrated design, without worrying about the leaking problem. Free your hands, far away from the life that stir the beverage by spoon, now you just need to wait and drink with the advanced tech. And the newest update design with magnetized stirrer makes the cleaning easier.

UPDETE SELF STIRRING MUG, PUSH START BUTTON, EASY TO USE: Without pressing the button all the time, you just need to install two AAA batteries into the base of the mug, then add water and powder into coffee mug, pressing the switch on the handle and the stirrer will start working. If you think the time is okay, you only need to press the button once again.

BEST GIFT IDEA: A cute mug, a cute gift. A best gift for your families, friends and colleagues who love coffee, hot chocolate, protein powder or other beverages that need stirred. Giving the person you loved this mug, warm their hands, hearts and the whole life. Warmer self-stirring magnetic mug, warmer life! Perfect for home, office, travel, Father’s day, Mother’s day, Christmas gift, Thanksgiving day, Halloween, Black Friday, Cyber Monday, etc.

CUTE & CHARACTERISTIC DESIGN: "Big belly" model with a cute cat face and the words “I KNOW WHO I AM”, offers you a happy mood everyday when you use it. Self-stirring tech saves more time for you; top quality stainless steel keeps the water temperature within 3-4 hours.

DURABLE QUALITY: LEADNOVO self-stirring mug adopts advanced technology and food grade material, dedicated to providing you with a safe and durable product. LEADNOVO offers one year warranty and friendly customer service with 100% quality assurance.
